publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 60
ab.l:
Č́eb́ar avaz ḱot́uŕuv́č́uǵa Šušan ʿedut üśt́uńa abajly miźmor David́ǵa üv́ŕańḿa. Urušḥanynda
Aram Naharajim byla da Aram Cova byla da qajtty Joʾav da vatty Edom- nu tuzlu eniš́t́a on eki miń. E Teńri śeń kemiš́tij biźni buzduj biźni ačuvlanyp tynč et́kiń biźǵa.
Qaltrattyj jerni jaraladyj any onɣaltḥyn synmaḥlaryn ki tajsa.
Ḱorǵuźd́uj ulusu ja qaty iš́ĺar ičirdij uv čaɣyry.
B́ergiń qorḥuvčularyja alam alamlanma alnyndan kertilikniń hamḿeš́a.
Anyn üč́uń qutulgejlar śuv́arĺarij jarlyɣašlaɣyn on ḱuč́uj byla da qaruv b́ergiń maja.
Teńri śoźĺadi aziź ḱokt́a quvanajym üĺaš́ajim Šekem- ni da enišiń Sukkotnun öĺčajim.
Ḿenimdir Gileʿad da ḿenim Menaše da Efrajim kipligi bašymnyn Juhuda ŕesim qojuvčum.
Moʾab pomja qazanym Edom üśt́uńa tašlarmyn etigimni üśt́uḿa Pelešet qyčḥyrɣynča .
Kim keĺtirsejedi ḿeni b́ek šaharɣa kim ḱońd́arśa edi ḿeni Edomɣa dejiń.
Muna śeń Teńri kemiš́tij biźni da čyḥ- mejsyn e Teńri č́eriv́ĺarimiźǵa.
Teńriǵa išanyp onaryrbyz tuvušluḥ byla da ol t́ept́ar et́ar tar b́eŕuv́č́uĺarimiźni.

app.note: Verse [11] is missing. Cf. also the missing verse in ADub.III.84.
